pageProduct.name: Wagner Kids Vitamin C Chewable 100 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Warnings

Always read the label; take only as directed.
Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Formulated without:
Gluten, wheat, animal products, dairy products, egg, soy, artificial flavours, artificial sweeteners or preservatives.

Ingredients

Each chewable tablet provides
Sodium ascorbate      53.44mg
Equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C)    47.5mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C)     52.6mg
Total Vitamin C     100mg
Contains Sugars.

Directions

Children 3 years +: Chew 1 tablet daily with food.
Children 1 - 3 years: Crush 1 tablet and mix with food or liquid once daily. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
